video.title: Bates Motel
video.synopsis: Everyone knows what happened in "Psycho," but this chilling series takes viewers inside Norman Bates' world before Marion Crane checked in.

episodes.synopsis: Seeking a fresh start after her husband's tragic death, Norma Bates buys a motel on the outskirts of an idyllic coastal town.
episodes.title: First You Dream, Then You Die

episodes.synopsis: Dylan wastes no time causing trouble at home. Meanwhile, the Bates family is inexorably drawn into the dark underbelly of White Pine Bay.
episodes.title: Nice Town You Picked, Norma..

episodes.synopsis: Dylan starts his new job and learns that there's more to it than he imagined. Meanwhile, Norman makes a shocking discovery.
episodes.title: What's Wrong with Norman

episodes.synopsis: As Norma's suspicions about people in town are raised, other distractions continue to surface.
episodes.title: Trust Me

episodes.synopsis: While Norman desperately seeks his mother's return home, Norma gets some much-needed help from Shelby.
episodes.title: Ocean View

episodes.synopsis: Dylan asks Norman to move in with him. Meanwhile, chaos erupts at the Bates home, and the situation with Shelby comes to a head.
episodes.title: The Truth

episodes.synopsis: Norma's first guest at the Bates Motel isn't what she expected. Meanwhile, Norman discovers that even popular girls are complicated.
episodes.title: The Man in Number 9

episodes.synopsis: Norma finds herself in conflict with a mysterious stranger. Elsewhere, Dylan and Remo go on a road trip that has a violent outcome.
episodes.title: A Boy and His Dog

episodes.synopsis: Abernathy amps up the pressure, but Norma doesn't know what he wants. Meanwhile, Dylan and Bradley connect, and Emma goes on a trip.
episodes.title: Underwater

episodes.synopsis: Romero decides that it's time to act. Meanwhile, Norman takes Emma to the dance.
episodes.title: Midnight

episodes.synopsis: While Norman fixates on Miss Watson's death, Norma gets bad news about the bypass project, and Bradley's hunt for her father's killer gets dangerous.
episodes.title: Gone But Not Forgotten

episodes.synopsis: Norma tries to distract Norman from his obsession with Miss Watson by auditioning for a play, and a new player in town has Dylan and Remo on edge.
episodes.title: Shadow of a Doubt

episodes.synopsis: Norma meets an ally in her battle to stop the bypass, Emma organizes a memorial for Bradley, and Norman falls under the influence of a townie girl.
episodes.title: Caleb

episodes.synopsis: A new revelation forces Dylan to question his loyalty to Norma and Norman, while Christine brings Norma into the White Pine social scene.
episodes.title: Check-Out

episodes.synopsis: Norman trusts Cody with a family secret, Dylan fights for his life as Zane's war escalates, and Norma makes a deal to help stop the bypass.
episodes.title: The Escape Artist

episodes.synopsis: Dylan must deal with a volatile situation, Norma and Norman's relationship is threatened by a secret, and Emma finds herself in danger.
episodes.title: Plunge

episodes.synopsis: Norman questions Norma's faith in him, Zane's thirst for revenge threatens Dylan, and Miss Watson's murder investigation takes a new turn.
episodes.title: Presumed Innocent

episodes.synopsis: Norman pushes Norma away when she won't tell him the truth about his blackouts, while the war between the drug families puts Dylan in a tough spot.
episodes.title: Meltdown

episodes.synopsis: When Norman disappears, Dylan must decide whether risking his life is worth saving him. Romero tries to determine if Norman is guilty of a crime.
episodes.title: The Box

episodes.synopsis: Norma tries to save Norman from making a mistake, while Romero and Dylan bring closure to the drug war, and Emma makes a decision about her future.
episodes.title: The Immutable Truth
